dialogues.text: poised for @ moment in the air: Thorn's mouth stretching open into an agonized scream...as the knife suddenly stre downward: a SHOT RINGING OUT in the night. Suddenly everything stops.

dialogues.speaker: THE CHURCH 699
dialogues.text: like a tableau through the haze of downpouring rain; Thor sitting stiffly on the church stairs: the child stretched out on his lap: both immobile; illuminated by a shaft of light pouring from the windows of the church. The police in f.g. as the four Officers move forward. EVERYTHING HOLDS. cur TO:

dialogues.text: as a long funeral procession, perhaps a hundred limousine with headlights on, moves slowly away from JFK Airport -- and onto the highway...

dialogues.speaker: DAY
dialogues.text: on the burial in progress: a hundred or so mourners gathe around the site: a Priest's voice is HEARD, distant, delivering a graveside eulogy.

dialogues.speaker: A GROUP OF PHOTOGRAPHERS 702
dialogues.text: held back at the gates: some taking pictures with long- distance lenses, others waiting for a better chance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: showing the Priest's face through the heads of mourners a solemnly speaks.

dialogues.speaker: PRIEST
dialogues.text: +.-The son of a great man,.-born into wealth and security...every earthly benefit a human being could possibly have. But in this example, we see that earthly benefits are not enough...

dialogues.text: Nothin' weird about that, either. That's the way it goes these days, “CLOSE ON THE FUNERAL 707 CAMERA SLOWLY MOVING IN through the crowds to REVEAL a ma and woman: extremely dignified -- the woman's face covere with a black veil, a child held firmly in her arms.

dialogues.text: until we can MAKE OUT the face of the child. It is Thorn' child: Damien, Looking beautiful and restored, wearing a heavy bandage on his arm -- his face calm and placid as h gazes down at the grave. .

dialogues.speaker: PRIEST
dialogues.text: -eeAnd to the child, Damien Thorn... the only survivor of this terrible misfortune...may God bestow His blessing and graces...may Christ bestow His eternal love. Cont.  rey 711 Cont. Overhead there is a FAINT RUMBLE OF THUNDER -- the crowd slowly beginning to disperse.

dialogues.text: lingering by the grave: the dignified man and his wife, standing stoically -- the child held in her arms.

dialogues.text: as two conservatively dressed MEN approach them, standing protectively, on either side.
